Avoiding Distraction

Distraction is the first thing that appear while studying

First thing , It is hard to work on any thing after entertain ourselves with joy(playing games,using mobile etc).So it is better to limit these thing before studying

Rules : 
  • Limit mind before studying
  • Timer can solve distraction problem
  • Memorizing : Read,Understand,Imagine,Explain,Repeat,Move on
  • Understanding: Multiple Course,Exploring the basic
Human Mind

popular psychology often cites that the average human experiences anywhere from 60,000 to 80,000 thoughts per day

This is really a huge number.As God has own Idea about giving such thing to a human that differentiate them with other animal.

So it is possible that our mind can go to anywhere during studing.It is a normal phenomena

The distruction is not while we imagine something or thougt about that includes in our styudy. But while to dealt with others thing excluding our study

Setting a timer can solve thing distraction

How to keep focus

There are mainly two types or studying precess either we memorize something or try to understant something

Memorizing something

To memorize something..

  • Understand the line
  • Imagine the line(by the topic image,visual anythging related to it)
  • Explain it to other in a Imagination (If teacher does not know he cant explain,if you explain it to anyone then yout got it)
  • Repeat the line 2 times,now the work is done

Understanding something
  • Understanding something from core is so inportant because in future you will stuck for it
  • Understainding mathmetics,grammer structure,chemical reaction require understaning the base
  • To understand something we have to follow more teacher , because every teacher has some uniqueness in their method,Find the teaher who really start from basic like any student younger than you will understant his topic
